actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Newport Bay Harbor, California, to authorize the Corps of Engineers to dredge and maintain a certain portion of upper Newport Bay.

summary.text: Modifies the navigation project for Newport Bay Harbor, California, to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to dredge and maintain a certain portion of upper Newport Bay to a depth consistent with the depth in the existing project for lower Newport Bay.

titles.title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Newport Bay Harbor, California, to authorize the Corps of Engineers to dredge and maintain a certain portion of upper Newport Bay.
